Name: Football Disciplinary Action
Description: Disciplinary action within an association football (soccer) game is typically a red or yellow card.

Properties.Name: Minute
Properties.Description: The minute during the game at which this punishment was given

Properties.Name: Player
Properties.Description: The football player who was disciplined

Properties.Name: Punishment
Properties.Description: The card or warning given to the player during the game

Properties.Name: Match
Properties.Description: The match in which this disciplinary action was given
